item.title: Added v0.dev to Code Generation section.
item.description: https://v0.dev/ - v0 uses AI models to generate code based on simple text prompts. It generates copy-and-paste friendly React code based on shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS that people can use in their projects. Each generation takes at minimum 30 credits. You start up with 1200 credits, and get 200 free credits every month.

Design your template in a Canva-like aditor and render images (.jpg, .png, .webp) and PDFs with code. Free tier plan with 100 credits per month.

item.description: https://datadeaddrop.com - Drop](https://datadeaddrop.com) - Simple, free file sharing. Data self-destroys after access. Upload and download data via the browser or your favorite command line client.
